title.rendered: Ambassador Yusuf M. Tuggar (OON) received in audience, His Excellency Jose Mba Abeso

content.rendered:
Today, 16th April, 2024 the Honourable Minister of Foreign Affairs, Ambassador Yusuf M. Tuggar (OON) received in audience, His Excellency Jose Mba Abeso, Executive Secretary, Gulf of Guinea Commission (GGC) and the Deputy Executive Secretary (Political Affairs) of GGC, Ambassador Obinna C. Agbugba.
Discussions centered on strengthening the Commission’s relations with Member States, including Nigeria for effective delivery of its mandate of enhancing the safety and security of the Gulf of Guinea; and expanding the membership of the Commission, among others.
